price: Dan telah Kami berikan kepada mereka di antara tanda-tanda (kebesaran Kami) sesuatu yang di dalamnya terdapat nikmat yang nyata.796)
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ
footnotes: *796) Seperti naungan awan, turunnya manna dan salwa; terpancarnya air dari batu, dan terbelahnya Laut Merah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
